required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retinal Microvasculature Before and After Silicone Oil by OCTA
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Retinal Microvasculature Before and After Silicone Oil Removal by Optical Coherence Tomography Angiography

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective study to assess the retinal microvasculature, optic nerve head vasculature and retinal sensitivity using OCTA and microperimetry before and after silicone oil removal.

detailed_description.textblock:
Prospective study to assess the retinal microvasculature, optic nerve head vasculature and retinal sensitivity using OCTA and microperimetry before and after silicone oil removal.
The study includes 30 patients with silicone oil tamponade will be evaluated before and after silicone oil removal

primary_outcome.measure: Macular and optic nerve head vascular density
primary_outcome.description: Using OCTA to assess vascular density changes of the macula and optic nerve head before and after silicone oil removal
Using microperimetry to assess the retinal sensitivity changes before and after silicone oil removal

secondary_outcome.measure: Retinal vascular density and best corrected visual acuity
secondary_outcome.description: Correlate the change in the retinal vascular density with best corrected visual acuity

secondary_outcome.measure: Optic nerve head vascular density and best corrected visual acuity
secondary_outcome.description: Correlate the change in the optic nerve head vascular density with best corrected visual acuity

secondary_outcome.measure: Retinal sensitivity and best corrected visual acuity
secondary_outcome.description: Correlate the change in the retinal sensitivity with best corrected visual acuity

intervention.intervention_name: Microperimtery and optical coherence tomography angiography OCTA
intervention.description: observational: Investigations are done to assess the retinal microvasculature and function before and after silicone oil removal

study_pop.textblock: Prospective observational case series of patients before and after silicone oil removal

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 30 eyes of 30 patients with silicone oil tamponade will be evaluated before and after silicone oil removal
Exclusion Criteria:
- Proliferative diabetic retinopathy, recurrent detachment or macular hole
- Patients with chorioretinal degenerations involving the macula
- Secondary complications as cataract, silicone oil emulsification, or secondary glaucoma
- Media opacity hindering proper imaging
